title: El Salvador Type
content:
I’m researching font design/typography of El Salvador. Any help with the following would be much appreciated:

- Foundries from El Salvador  
- Fonts with characteristics unique to El Salvador  
- Fonts designed for use in El Salvador  
- Packaging and signage from El Salvador  
- Calligraphy, inscriptions and other lettering from El Salvador  
- Basically any type that is connected with El Salvador

Thanks in advance.
author: tywilkins

comments.content:
My first stop for stuff like this tends to be MyFonts…

[http://www.myfonts.com/country/sv/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060129194723/http:/www.myfonts.com/country/sv/)

And they have nothing :-(
